remarks: If the number of the neighbors of a vertex in a finite graph is the number of vertices of the graph minus 1, each vertex except the first mentioned vertex is a neighbor of this vertex.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Jul-2018.)
statement: nbhashuvtx1 $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ V e. Fin /\ N e. V ) -> ( ( # ` ( <. V , E >. Neighbors N ) ) = ( ( # ` V ) - 1 ) -> ( ( M e. V /\ M =/= N ) -> M e. ( <. V , E >. Neighbors N ) ) ) ) $.
